message: Ending the seal hunt will destroy a part of Newfoundland's culture. These seals are killed in a quick and painless way. Idk about you guys but have you seen the videos on how they slaughter cows and chickens? Only adult seals are hunted and never the younger babies. These seals are overpopulated and are destroying our ecosystem as it is. Getting rid of the seal hunt would only create more problems. Paul McCartney said that he seen the slaughter first hand out on the ice, but all newfoundlanders know for a fact he never did go out there, he was actually at a studio in p.e.i.
